item.title: YouTuber music group Melon Parker visual novel Melon Parker: Kimi ga Nandemo Bu no Buchou-san! announced for PS4, Switch, PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Smartphone
  • Switch

Due out on November 27.

CyberStep visual novel game brand Rabbitfoot has announced Melon Parker: Kimi ga Nandemo Bu no Buchou-san!, a fully voiced visual novel starring YouTuber music group Melon Parker for PlayStation 4, Switch, PC (Steam), iOS, and Android. It will launch on November 27 with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and other language support. A physical edition will also be available for Switch in Japan.

Here is the story synopsis:

You and your five childhood friends—Naroya, Samurai Sho, Soraneko, KAITO, and kamome—are members of the “Everything Club” at Melon Pan Private High School.

While cheerfully resolving the incidents that arise at school and enjoying everyday life, you suddenly find yourselves performing at a music festival!?

Can the “Everything Club” succeed in pulling off a big event like a music festival stage?

And where will your coming-of-age story with your five childhood friends lead…?

Visit the official website here.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/youtuber-music-group-melon-parker-visual-novel-melon-parker-kimi-ga-nandemo-bu-no-buchou-san-announced-for-ps4-switch-pc-ios-and-android
